description: Экран мониторинга инвентаризации узлов отображает список инвентаризации всех узлов выбранного центра обработки данных и кластера. Ответственный:  Альбещенко М.Н. (АЦОД)

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of all hosts in the selected data center and cluster.

targets.rawSql:
--br1 - This report will display a list of all hosts configuration data by Datacenter and Cluster

SELECT
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_name,
    v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_name,
    -- A fully qualified domain name ( fqdn )
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.fqdn_or_ip,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.vdsm_version,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_os,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date AS cluster_delete,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.create_date AS date ) AS create_date,
    CAST ( v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date AS date ) AS delete_date
FROM 
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id =
                v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
                -- Here we get the cluster latest configuration
                AND v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.history_id 
                    IN 
                        (
                            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                            FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                            GROUP BY a.cluster_id
                        )
            )
WHERE 
    -- Filter hosts list according to the data center that was chosen by the user
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT a.cluster_id
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a
                WHERE a.datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
            )
    -- Filter list according to the host/s that was chosen by the user
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
    -- Here we get the host latest configuration
    AND v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
        IN     
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a
                GROUP BY a.host_id
            )
    -- This will determine where deleted entities will be included in the report,
    -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
    AND
        CASE
          WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
              THEN 1=1
          WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
              THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date DESC,
    v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.host_name

panels.description: This report displays a inventory list of hosts hardware details in the selected data center and cluster.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE 
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN host_name 	 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	      	    
            THEN host_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'
    END AS host_name,
    cpu_model,
    number_of_cores AS host_cpu,
    ROUND ( CAST ( COALESCE ( memory_size_mb, 0.00 ) AS float ) :: numeric / 1024, 1 ) AS host_memsize,
    hardware_manufacturer AS "Server Manufacturer",
    hardware_product_name AS "Server Name",
    hardware_serial_number AS "Server Serial Number"
FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts
WHERE 
    host_id IN ($host_id)
    AND
        history_id
            IN
                (
                    SELECT MAX (history_id)
                    FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts
                    GROUP BY host_id
                )
    AND
        CASE
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                THEN 1=1
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                THEN delete_date isnull
        END
ORDER BY host_name, hardware_manufacturer, hardware_product_name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT  CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value, CASE     WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    THEN datacenter_name 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' END AS __text FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters WHERE      history_id          IN              (  	            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		        GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	        ) 	AND  	    datacenter_id  	        IN 			    ( 					SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					WHERE  					    cluster_id 					        IN 					            ( 									SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  								) 				) 	AND 	   CASE  	       WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           THEN 1=1 		   WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	   END
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT  CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value, CASE     WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    THEN datacenter_name 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' END AS __text FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters WHERE      history_id          IN              (  	            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        FROM v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters a  		        GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	        ) 	AND  	    datacenter_id  	        IN 			    ( 					SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters 					WHERE  					    cluster_id 					        IN 					            ( 									SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  								) 				) 	AND 	   CASE  	       WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           THEN 1=1 		   WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       THEN v4_4_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	   END

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT  CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value, CASE     WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    THEN cluster_name 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' END AS __text FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters WHERE      history_id          IN              (  	            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		        GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	        ) 	AND  	    cluster_id  	        IN 			    ( 					SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts 				) 	AND 	   CASE  	       WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           THEN 1=1 		   WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	   END    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT  CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value, CASE     WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	    THEN cluster_name 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT NULL  	     THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')' END AS __text FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters WHERE      history_id          IN              (  	            SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		        FROM v4_4_configuration_history_clusters a  		        GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	        ) 	AND  	    cluster_id  	        IN 			    ( 					SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts 				) 	AND 	   CASE  	       WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	           THEN 1=1 		   WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		       THEN v4_4_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	   END    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT   CAST ( host_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  CASE          WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    THEN host_name 	 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    THEN host_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  END AS __text  		FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  		WHERE       		    history_id           			    IN               				(  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a  		         					GROUP BY a.host_id 	         				) 	 			AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)  			AND 	    			    CASE  	        				    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    THEN 1=1 		    					WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date ISNULL 	                END
list.label: Host
list.name: host_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT   CAST ( host_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  CASE          WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    THEN host_name 	 	WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    THEN host_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  END AS __text  		FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts  		WHERE       		    history_id           			    IN               				(  	             					SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					FROM v4_4_configuration_history_hosts a  		         					GROUP BY a.host_id 	         				) 	 			AND cluster_id IN ($cluster_id)  			AND 	    			    CASE  	        				    WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    THEN 1=1 		    					WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    THEN v4_4_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date ISNULL 	                END
